title: Message to President Thomas G. Masaryk on Czechoslovakia's Independence Day.
text:
I EXTEND to Your Excellency cordial felicitations on this day and best wishes for the continued prosperity of Czechoslovakia as well as for Your Excellency's own happiness and well-being.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency T. G. Masaryk, President of Czechoslovakia, Prague]
